group_1.narration: Here, in the apartment complex.@Now even the neighborhood council@is putting up posters about it.
I don't think this weird uneasiness I'm@feeling is just because I'm scared.

group_1.textLeft: I'm telling you, there's no way she'll@say yes!

group_1.textRight: B-but, we should at least try asking!
Okay, I'm just gonna say it!
You know, if you want to...
Seika, do you wanna come and eat lunch@with us?

group_1.textLeft: (They're inviting me to hang out with them?!)
(This is the first time anyone other than@Leila and Mito ever asked me!)

group_1.narration: I've had awful social anxiety ever since I@was little. I can't talk to strangers.
It's not because I hate people.@When I look someone in the eyes,@my whole body floods with fear.
So it was only natural I spent@all my time by myself.
I want to make friends with someone!@But I can't get a word out.@It's so lonely being by myself!@But starting a conversation is so scary.

group_1.textLeft: (But right now, the girls in front of me...)

group_1.textRight: We haven't talked to you much since we've@been in this class together.

group_1.textLeft: (No, it's no good. The words won't come.)

group_1.textRight: See?! What'd I tell you? Sorry we bothered@[chara:800100:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800100:cheek_0][chara:800100:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:800100:lipSynch_1]you!

group_1.narration: When my social anxiety is at its worst, I@apparently make a demonic face.
Because of that, I've always been@labelled as "a stubborn girl who doesn't@let anyone get close" or "a grouch who@just wants to be alone."
It's not even because of anything I've done.@It's just the first impression I give off.

group_1.textCenter: (It happened again. Now this is going to@make my reputation even worse.)
(Why does it always end up like this?)
(I guess I'll just go to my spot again.)
